tags: *Service de consultation et de communication en gestion du changement
full_summary:
# Risk Management Specialist
=========================

### Notice Details

* **Notice Title:** [Risk Management Specialist](#risk-management-specialist)
* **Announcement Date:** May 11, 2023
* **Closing Date:** May 31, 2023 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date:** May 31, 2023
* **Procurement Category:** [SRV](#provision-of-specialized-professional-services)
* **Trade Agreements:** The Government of Canada allows bidders from the following countries: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* **Notice Type:** [Request for Proposal](#request-for-proposal)
* **Procurement Method:** [Competitive - Open Bidding](#competitive-open-bidding)
* **Selection Criteria:** The bid will be evaluated on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

### RFP Documents

You can download the RFP documents from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4949/23-225879-a---rfp-english---security-risk-management-final.pdf) or [Canada Buys (FR)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5485/23-225879a---addendum-no-1-%28english.pdf).

### Additional Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 3, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
* **End User Entity:** None

### Contact Person

* Name: Arif Hussain
* Email: [arif.hussain@international.gc.ca](mailto:arif.hussain@international.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 204-1833
* Address: 220 Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0G
